channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Interior Dept. offers $20 million in grants for 'slip-on tankers' to help towns fight wildfires

item.title: Trump to reduce India tariffs after Modi pledges to stop buying Russian oil
item.description: President Trump on Monday lowered the tariffs he placed on goods from India after Prime Minister Narendra Modi agreed to stop buying Russian oil.

item.title: Trump in Iowa tries to shift the conversation back to the economy
item.description: A brief swing through the farm state underscored administration fears about the midterms.

item.title: Americans give Trump low marks on handling of economy as midterms likely to center on affordability
item.description: Sixty-one percent of voters told a CNN poll released Friday that they disapprove of the way Trump is handling the economy.
